mapper.select: select seqno, title, userid, to_char(bbs_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') "bbs_date" from (select rownum rnum, seqno, title, userid, bbs_date from (select * from bbs order by seqno desc)) where (rnum>((#{pageno} - 1) * 5)) and (rnum < ((#{pageno} - 1) * 5) + 6)
select seqno, title, content, userid, to_char(bbs_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') "bbs_date" from bbs where seqno = #{seqno}
mapper.insert: insert into member_ex (userid, userpw, username, usernick, phone) values (#{userid},#{userpw},#{username},#{usernick},#{phone})
mapper.select: select count(*) from selling_item where code = #{code}
select name, price from selling_item where code = #{code}
